name: Super Knife Cut
description:
Super Knife Cut is a knife throwing game, where you have to slice through your enemies. You cannot hit any other knives, swords or any other obstacles that is attached to the wood. An endless amount of stages and increasing experience. Be the best knife thrower in the world!

As you progress, your weapons will be upgrade. An infinite amount of stages with challenging bosses await. flick your super knife to the skies and destroy the wooden obstacles!

• Throw knives at enemies 

• Over 25 different bosses 

• Custom swords and knives 

• Endless fun and increasing experience 

• Custom knives can be unlocked 

• A wide range of difficult obstacles
